contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 28, 2018 D Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Third Section)
Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice from a Specified List Brass at the Guild (Preston) brass-at-the-guild-preston-contest-third-section
Napoleon on the Alps
Guild Hall (Grand Hall), Preston, Lancashire, England, UK Test piece can be Napoleon on the Alps or Overture to Henry V (Ralph Vaughan Williams). All bands chose Napoleon on the Alps. Best Soloist: Principal cornet (Skelmersdale) Best Percussion: Golborne Brass Best Horn: City of Chester Best Trombone: Eccleston Brass Best Basses: Allerton Brass
Sept. 23, 2017, 11:13 a.m. Feb. 13, 2018, 5:38 p.m.
1 Eccleston Brass John Wood
2 Allerton Brass Band Adam Taylor
3 City of Chester Band Matthew Birkett
4 Audley Brass Tom Hancock
5 Skelmersdale Prize Band James Hall
6 Greenalls Band Philip Boardman
7 Golborne Band Matt Shaw
8 Littleborough Band Adrian Woodhead
9 Pilling Jubilee Silver Band Steve Hartley
10 Thornton Cleveleys Band Stephen Craig
11 Huddersfield and Ripponden Brass Adam Bell
12 Dobcross Silver Band Grenville Moore
13 Oughtibridge Band Rob Straw
